entry.title: 'Hello World'
entry.summary: So, I want to do stuff, I decided. The thing is, stuff is a pretty broad concept and I am not sure what exactly I want this stuff to be - yet. But consuming stuff for nearly three decades now, I think it is time to finally create some stuff myself. Lets see how it goes.

entry.title: Enter the Indie Web
entry.summary: The Internet is dead, long live the Internet!

entry.title: The virtuality of reality
entry.summary: Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy? Caught in a landslide, no escape from reality Open your eyes, look up to the skies and see

entry.title: Knowledge and how to overcome it
entry.summary: I don't know, but have you heard of 'generative AI' of lately? It seems to be a thing now.

entry.title: A Hitchhiker's Guide to the Fediverse
entry.summary: Long ago, the online communities coexisted together in harmony. Then, everything changed when the corporate web attacked. Only the RSS-feed, a decentralized content distribution, could stop them, but when the world needed it most, it vanished.

entry.title: Open Source, a song of worth and value
entry.summary: Hey, you! Yeah, you - or do you see someone else here I am talking to? Do you have time to talk about our lord and saviour, free and Open Source software?
